title: Design database schema for resource access logs with user ID, timestamp, IP, access type fields
summary: Create a comprehensive database schema to store resource access logs including user identifiers, timestamps, source IP addresses, and access type fields. The schema must support high-volume logging operations and efficient querying for compliance reporting.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: log all resource access (user ID, timestamp, IP, access type, context)

title: Implement access logging middleware to capture read, edit, export actions across API and UI
summary: Develop middleware components that intercept and log all resource access operations including read, edit, and export actions across both API endpoints and user interface interactions. The middleware must capture contextual information and ensure consistent logging across all system touchpoints.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: log all resource access... across API and UI

title: Create configurable log retention system with 1-year default storage period
summary: Build a configurable log retention system that automatically manages log lifecycle with a default retention period of one year. The system must support custom retention periods based on regulatory requirements and include automated archival or deletion processes.

title: Build role-based access control for log export restricted to Compliance and Security roles
summary: Implement role-based access control mechanisms to restrict log export functionality exclusively to users with Compliance and Security roles. The system must enforce strict authorization checks and maintain an audit trail of export operations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: provide CSV/JSON export for Compliance/Security roles

title: Develop CSV and JSON export functionality for access logs
summary: Create export modules that generate CSV and JSON formatted outputs of access logs. The export functionality must handle large datasets efficiently and maintain data integrity during the export process.

title: Implement log filtering by date, user, and resource type for exports
summary: Build comprehensive filtering capabilities for log exports allowing selection by date ranges, specific users, and resource types. The filtering system must support complex queries and provide efficient performance even with large datasets.

title: Create sensitive data masking system for exports based on company and jurisdiction policies
summary: Develop a sophisticated data masking system that automatically redacts or obfuscates sensitive information in exported logs based on configurable company policies and jurisdiction-specific data protection requirements. The system must support different masking levels and maintain audit trails of masking operations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: handle sensitive data masking based on policies

title: Implement historical role context preservation in logs when user roles change
summary: Create a system to capture and preserve the historical role context of users at the time of access, ensuring accurate audit trails even when user roles change over time. The implementation must maintain point-in-time role information for compliance and investigation purposes.

title: Build notification system for compliance team leads on large-volume exports
summary: Develop an automated notification system that alerts compliance team leads when large-volume log exports occur. The system must include configurable thresholds, notification channels, and provide export metadata in alerts.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: notify compliance leads of unusual patterns

title: Create anomaly detection for unusual access patterns with compliance notifications
summary: Implement machine learning or rule-based anomaly detection to identify unusual access patterns in resource logs. The system must automatically notify compliance teams when anomalies are detected and provide detailed context for investigation.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: notify compliance leads of unusual patterns

title: Implement rate limiting for log export functionality to prevent abuse
summary: Add rate limiting controls to the log export API endpoints to prevent system abuse and resource exhaustion. This includes implementing per-user and per-role export quotas with configurable thresholds.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: include rate-limiting for exports while meeting geographic data protection requirements

title: Update admin documentation with log export and retention guidelines
summary: Create comprehensive documentation for administrators covering log export procedures, data retention policies, and compliance guidelines. Include role-based access permissions and geographic data protection requirements.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: System must log all resource access... with 1-year retention, provide CSV/JSON export for Compliance/Security roles
